      • findAll

        java.util.List<User> findAll(java.lang.String orderField)
        Find all users sorted based on the orderField.
        Parameters:
        orderField - the order field to sort
        Returns:
        a sorted list of the users.

      • updatePassword

        void updatePassword(java.lang.Long id,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Update the password of a user.
        Parameters:

        password - the new password to update

      • findByEmailAndPassword

        User findByEmailAndPassword(java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Find the user by its email and password. This method is essentially used to authenticate a user.
        Parameters:
        email - email to be used as username.
        password - password of the user.
        Returns:
        Found user, null if not found or authentication fails.

      • findByFilter

        PaginatedData<User> findByFilter(UserFilter userFilter)
        Find the user based on the user filter.
        Parameters:
        userFilter - the user filter to be used.
        Returns:
        a paginated data of user.
